description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2to14","text":"Overview: The goals of this protocol are to pool your PCR product into a single 1.5 mL tube and to purify that product using magnetic beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8a4l3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rfa5","text":"Time required: ~45 minutes (mostly waiting)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6m3hk","text":"Using a 10uL multichannel pipette, transfer   or    of PCR product from each row of your 96 well plate of PCR amplicons into the corresponding cells of a new eight tube strip. (Ex - If you are transferring 3 plates of amplications, at the conclusion, there should be   of product in each of the eight tubes in the strip [12 cells x 3uL x 3 plates].) Use  from each PCR reaction if you are combining three plates;   if you are combining 5 plates (see total volumes below in next step).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":267,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":354,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":413,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"59k0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"6EEB1C90E61011ECB505A56B3249EE14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"DF11A9D0D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"108","error":false,"guid":"0427EA40E61111ECB505A56B3249EE14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"0D7B0A90E61211ECB505A56B3249EE14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"100EFBE0E61211ECB505A56B3249EE14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"erdgq","text":"Using a 200uL or 1000uL pipette, transfer the PCR pools from each of the eight tubes of the strip into a new 1.5mL LoBind eppi tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8aib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8i4d1","text":"Final 1.5mL tube volumes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9me0a","text":"3 plates - 288 samples -   (3uL per cell)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bjn6k","text":"4 plates - 384 samples -   (2uL per cell) or   (3uL per cell)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eg17k","text":"5 plates - 480 samples -   (2uL per cell) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6840l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hidd","text":"Mix the tube by turning it upside down 3-5 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"864","error":false,"guid":"E7A3E090D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"768","error":false,"guid":"D92B94E0E61011ECB505A56B3249EE14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.15","error":false,"guid":"EA5CBF00D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"960","error":false,"guid":"DBE0A2C0E61011ECB505A56B3249EE14","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"25g5i","text":"Bring magnetic beads to room temp. (Should be stored in the fridge)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eicm8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39t3l","text":"Subsample   of the amplicon pool to a new 1.5mL LoBind eppi tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9uvag","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qsv9","text":"Retain the tube with the original product. You will run a gel electrophoresis comparison between this product and the purified product. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32lhd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"FB91CE50D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dcbb1","text":"Vortex or shake beads thoroughly to suspend them in the solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8uj6a","text":"Add 0.5X ratio of magnetic beads to the 1.5mL tube containing the pooled amplicons. Ex - for 250uL subsampled pool, add   of beads. For 500mL amplicon pool, add 250uL of beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5fs9q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f62es","text":"Mix thoroughly by pipetting up and down 6-8 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"125","error":false,"guid":"54D33B70D89C11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3p652","text":"Incubate for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5tvld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"4B8D4510D89C11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amg40","text":"Place sample tube on the magnetic separator for   or until the solution clears. Beads should now be on the side of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"593rr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"41BFCF30D89C11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7asol","text":"With the tube still on the magnet, remove the liquid from the tube and discard. Be sure not to disturb the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32e6c","text":"Create a fresh batch of 80% ethanol. You will be using   in this protocol. You will be using more later, so make extra. A 15mL tube is one potential type of vessel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3uhhl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jpqe","text":"  100% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b6eob","text":"  molecular water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"de155","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"F3263260D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"F51928C0D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"F7564780D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7ngo","text":"With the tube still on the magnet, add   of 80% ethanol to the tube and let sit for  . Try to minimize disturbance of the beads. Fill gently with liquid stream from the pipette tip on opposite side of the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97q15","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"530B16E0D8A211ECAB17DFA380618E2A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"3097DF40D89C11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c7klf","text":"Remove ethanol by pipetting and discard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nkna","text":" Repeat the ethanol wash one time.    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5evj1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9A1F40C0D89C11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"step_guid":"81DD3090D89B11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3tfqf","text":"Dry by incubating the tube for 10-15 minutes at room temperature.  Ensure all of the ethanol has evaporated from the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c4fj4","text":"Heat a 1.5uL tube of molecular water to   in the heat block. ~1000uL should be sufficient in the tube. This step is optional but is helpful if a heat block is available.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"duunp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"121899F0D89D11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"an94h","text":"Remove the tube from the magnet and add   of   molecular water. Pipette up and down five times to mix until the pellet is fully suspended. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"busf7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btrtg","text":"The DNA will now be released from the beads and suspended in the water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bn5d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"4348EAC0D89D11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"467B17E0D89D11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pi31","text":"Incubate for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c4rb3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"61CF3F80D89D11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gcj","text":"Place the tube back on the magnet for  , or until the solution is clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ch48v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"7361B110D89D11EC95AE3FDDCB73E84B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9amoa","text":"Transfer the water containing the DNA to a new 1.5mL LoBind eppi tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51ti8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fd47j","text":"You should now have your pooled and purified DNA template.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5guq6","text":"Run a gel with a lane of the original product and a lane of the purified DNA template side by side. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mc9i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8818d","text":"Perform another purification if the primer band is still visible. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dupgd","text":"If you have access to a Quantus/Qubit fluorometer, now is a good time to quantify the resulting amount of DNA in your purified sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dia8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evhr4","text":"If not, the   of molecular water added above should put you near the right DNA concentration with room for a final adjustment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"53vk3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dv8pj","text":"You are looking to be around 1ug DNA per 50uL water as an end goal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m5vj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fshck","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehu8t","text":"Promega Wizard Extraction - results in ~63 ng/uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1spjd","text":"X-Amp extraction of dried tissues - results in ~72 ng/uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mtj8","text":"X-Amp extraction of fresh tissues - results in ~73 ng/uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4bj3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drm4k","text":"Combination of all three resulted in ~69 ng/uL. There are 1000ng in a ug. 1000/69 = 14.5uL to get to 1ug. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nldt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd0fv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ba8r7","text":"So for the final end product:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64qhr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p1v7","text":"14.5uL of the resulting DNA solution combined with 35.5uL of water for the next step. (1ug DNA per 50uL water),","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pqv5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"FC4A896FD8A411EC90060A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
